entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C

Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 04:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to valley bottom this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
